note: Automated chain booking setup before cancellation test

content.text:
You'll receive a confirmation text to your phone number and a email to your email address after your booking is confirmed.
      

      Here is the url to guarantee your booking: https://guarantee.ameniti.ai?id=df65abff-b24e-4ac8-ab6d-bad3c2440b27

keyPoints: Here is a secure link https://guarantee.ameniti.ai?id=df65abff-b24e-4ac8-ab6d-bad3c2440b27 to guarantee your booking.
The room and price are held for 15 minutes.
